sentences.english: Nor the logistics of having staff support a distributed PC estate.
sentences.chinese: 亦不后勤学有职员支持一个分布的个人计算机庄园。

sentences.english: But they still lack resources and face logistical issues.
sentences.chinese: 但是它们仍然缺乏资源并面临后勤问题。

sentences.english: A substantial part of your client base is the back office of the worldwide bank.
sentences.chinese: 你的一个人员下属机构是世界银行的后勤处。

sentences.english: This system had been passed by the technical appraisal of the Logistics Departmant of Military Region.
sentences.chinese: 该系统已通过军区后勤部的技术鉴定。

sentences.english: By the General Logistics Department excellent medical worker title.
sentences.chinese: 获总后勤部优秀医务工作者称号。

sentences.english: Mail and personal bills were handled by C&D's back office because of his inattention.
sentences.chinese: C&D的后勤部门要帮他处理信件和个人的账单。

sentences.english: Logistics systems are a lot of stovepipes not talking to each other.
sentences.chinese: 后勤系统很多是烟囱式的，相互之间不能互通。

sentences.english: Billing systems themselves are a well-understood back-office infrastructure component.
sentences.chinese: 付费系统本身是一种很成熟的后勤基础结构组件。

sentences.english: Business logistics management is a brandnew field of management study.
sentences.chinese: 商业后勤管理是管理学研究的新兴课题。

sentences.english: Sophia Pickles is a logistics officer for a non-governmental organization called GOAL.
sentences.chinese: 苏菲亚皮克是一家非政府机构GOAL的后勤人员。

sentences.english: The whole island will also serve as a permanent station and rear-supply base for ASA troops.
sentences.chinese: 崇明全岛同时是亚安军各部队的永久驻地和后勤基地。

sentences.english: Its capabilities were demonstrated by members of the Royal Logistics Corps.
sentences.chinese: 它的性能获得皇家后勤部成员的认可。

sentences.english: The logistic arm must deliver material to the combat forces int ime.
sentences.chinese: 后勤部队必须及时将物资输送到作战部队。

sentences.english: We will modernize weapons, equipment and logistics support across the board.
sentences.chinese: 全面提高武器装备和后勤保障的现代化水平。

sentences.english: Minetta collected his rifle and helmet from the hospital supply sergeant.
sentences.chinese: 米尼塔向医院的后勤中士领回了枪和钢盔。

sentences.english: Parana was already a logistical problem.
sentences.chinese: 巴拉那已经成为一个后勤问题。

definition: manpower resources (for military service)/sources of troops
